scripts.build-docxeditorSDK-net9: gulp server-build --option server-net9  && gulp wasm-build --option wasm-net9
scripts.build-docxeditorSDK-net10: gulp static-assets && gulp server-build --option server-net10  && gulp wasm-build --option wasm-net10
scripts.build-docxeditorSDK-net8: gulp server-build --option server-net8 && gulp wasm-build --option wasm-net8
scripts.publish-docxeditorSDK-net8: gulp publish --sample server-net8 --buildName docxeditorSDK && gulp publish --sample wasm-net8 --buildName docxeditorSDK
scripts.publish-docxeditorSDK-net9: gulp publish --sample server-net9 --buildName docxeditorSDK && gulp publish --sample wasm-net9 --buildName docxeditorSDK
scripts.publish-docxeditorSDK-net10: gulp publish --sample server-net10 --buildName docxeditorSDK && gulp publish --sample wasm-net10 --buildName docxeditorSDK
scripts.run-accessibility: npm run sample-build && npm run accessibility && gulp axecore-overall-report
